types.name: String
types.description: Built-in String

types.name: DocumentaryUnitDescription
types.description: An archival description with a specific language

fields.name: languageCode
fields.description: The description's language code

fields.name: name
fields.description: The description's title

fields.name: identifier
fields.description: The description's (optional) identifier

fields.name: accessPoints
fields.description: Access points associated with this description

fields.name: dates
fields.description: Date periods associated with this description

fields.name: archivistNote
fields.description: To explain how the description was prepared and by whom.

fields.name: archivalHistory
fields.description: Provides information on the history of the unit of description that is significant for its authenticity, integrity and interpretation.

fields.name: acquisition
fields.description: To identify the immediate source of acquisition or transfer.

fields.name: appraisal
fields.description: To provide information on any appraisal, destruction and scheduling action.

fields.name: accruals
fields.description: To inform the user of foreseen additions to the unit of description.

fields.name: biographicalHistory
fields.description: Provides an administrative history of, or biographical details on, the creator (or creators) of the unit of description to place the material in context and make it better understood.

fields.name: conditionsOfAccess
fields.description: To provide information on the legal status or other regulations that restrict or affect access to the unit of description.

fields.name: conditionsOfReproduction
fields.description: To identify any restrictions on reproduction of the unit of description.

fields.name: datesOfDescriptions
fields.description: To indicate when this description was prepared and/or revised.

fields.name: extentAndMedium
fields.description:
To identify and describe:
1. the physical or logical extent and
2. the medium of the unit of description.

fields.name: levelOfDescription
fields.description: !IsadG.levelOfDescription.description!

fields.name: relatedUnitsOfDescription
fields.description: To identify related units of description.

fields.name: physicalCharacteristics
fields.description: To provide information about any important physical characteristics or technical requirements that affect use of the unit of description.

fields.name: publicationNote
fields.description: To identify any publications that are about or are based on the use, study, or analysis of the unit of description.

fields.name: rulesAndConventions
fields.description: To identify the protocols on which the description is based.

fields.name: scopeAndContent
fields.description: Enables users to judge the potential relevance of the unit of description.

fields.name: separatedUnitsOfDescription
fields.description: Information about materials that are associated by provenance to the described materials but that have been physically separated or removed. Items may be separated for various reasons, including the dispersal of special formats to more appropriate custodial units; the outright destruction of duplicate or nonessential material; and the deliberate or unintentional scattering of fonds among different repositories.

fields.name: systemOfArrangement
fields.description: To provide information on the internal structure, the order and/or the system of classification of the unit of description.

fields.name: findingAids
fields.description: To identify any finding aids to the unit of description.

fields.name: languageOfMaterial
fields.description: To identify the language(s) employed in the unit of description.

fields.name: locationOfOriginals
fields.description: To indicate the existence, location, availability and/or destruction of originals where the unit of description consists of copies.

fields.name: locationOfCopies
fields.description: To indicate the existence, location and availability of copies of the unit of description.

fields.name: physicalLocation
fields.description: The physical location or shelf number of the item(s) within their repository or holding institution. (No direct ISAD(G) field equivalent.)

fields.name: notes
fields.description: To provide information that cannot be accommodated in any of the other areas.

fields.name: scriptOfMaterial
fields.description: To identify the script(s) employed in the unit of description.

fields.name: sources
fields.description: Record notes on sources consulted in preparing the description and who prepared it.

fields.name: unitDates
fields.description: !IsadG.unitDates.description!

types.name: Boolean
types.description: Built-in Boolean

types.name: RepositoryDescription
types.description: A repository description with a specific language

fields.name: languageCode
fields.description: The description's language code

fields.name: name
fields.description: The description's title

fields.name: identifier
fields.description: The description's (optional) identifier

fields.name: accessPoints
fields.description: Access points associated with this description

fields.name: addresses
fields.description: Addresses associated with this repository

fields.name: typeOfEntity
fields.description: !Isdiah.typeOfEntity.description!

fields.name: history
fields.description: To provide a concise history of the institution with archival holdings.

fields.name: geoculturalContext
fields.description: To provide information about the geographical and cultural context of the institution with archival holdings.

fields.name: mandates
fields.description: To indicate the sources of authority for the institution with archival holdings in terms of its powers, functions, responsibilities or sphere of activities, including territorial.

fields.name: administrativeStructure
fields.description: To represent the current administrative structure of the institution with archival holdings.

fields.name: records
fields.description: To provide information about the records management and collecting policies of the institution with archival holdings.

fields.name: buildings
fields.description: To provide information about the building(s) of the institution with archival holdings.

fields.name: holdings
fields.description: To provide a profile of the holdings of the institution.

fields.name: findingAids
fields.description: To provide a general overview of the published and/or unpublished finding aids and guides prepared by the institution with archival holdings and any other relevant publications.

fields.name: openingTimes
fields.description: To provide information on opening times and dates of annual closures.

fields.name: conditions
fields.description: To provide information about the conditions, requirements and procedures for access to, and use of institutional services.

fields.name: accessibility
fields.description: To provide accessibility information related to the institution with archival holdings and its services.

fields.name: researchServices
fields.description: To describe the research services provided by the institution with archival holdings.

fields.name: reproductionServices
fields.description: To provide information about reproduction services.

fields.name: publicAreas
fields.description: To provide information about areas of the institution available for public use.

fields.name: rulesAndConventions
fields.description: To identify the national or international conventions or rules applied in creating the description.

fields.name: status
fields.description: To indicate the drafting status of the description so that users can understand the current status of the description.

fields.name: datesOfDescriptions
fields.description: !Isdiah.datesOfDescriptions.description!

fields.name: maintenanceNotes
fields.description: To document additional information relating to the creation of and changes to the description.

fields.name: otherFormsOfName
fields.description: To indicate any other name(s) for the institution with archival holdings not used elsewhere in the Identity Area.

fields.name: parallelFormsOfName
fields.description: To indicate the various forms in which the authorised form of name of an institution with archival holdings occurs in other languages or script form(s).

fields.name: languages
fields.description: To indicate the language(s) used to create the description of the institution with archival holdings.

fields.name: scripts
fields.description: To indicate the script(s) used to create the description of the institution with archival holdings.

fields.name: sources
fields.description: To indicate the sources consulted in creating the description of the institution with archival holdings.

fields.name: fax
fields.description: Provides the means to contact an institution via fax.

fields.name: webpage
fields.description: The URL of the intitution''s web page.

fields.name: place
fields.description: To indicate the predominant places and/or jurisdictions where the corporate body, person or family was based, lived or resided or had some other connection.

fields.name: functions
fields.description: To indicate the functions, occupations and activities performed by the corporate body, person or family.

fields.name: mandates

fields.name: scripts
fields.description: To indicate the script(s) used to create the authority record.

fields.name: definition
fields.description: Supplies an explanation of the intended meaning of a concept.

fields.name: note
fields.description: Provides general documentation on the concept.

fields.name: scopeNote
fields.description: Supplies some, possibly partial, information about the intended meaning of a concept, especially as an indication of how the use of a concept is limited in indexing practice.

fields.name: editorialNote
fields.description: Supplies information that is an aid to administrative housekeeping, such as reminders of editorial work still to be done, or warnings in the event that future editorial changes might be made.

fields.name: historyNote
fields.description: Describes significant changes to the meaning or the form of a concept.

types.name: __Schema
types.description: A GraphQL Introspection defines the capabilities of a GraphQL server. It exposes all available types and directives on the server, the entry points for query, mutation, and subscription operations.

fields.name: types
fields.description: A list of all types supported by this server.

fields.name: queryType
fields.description: The type that query operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: mutationType
fields.description: If this server supports mutation, the type that mutation operations will be rooted at.

fields.name: directives
fields.description: 'A list of all directives supported by this server.

fields.name: subscriptionType
fields.description: 'If this server support subscription, the type that subscription operations will be rooted at.

types.name: __TypeKind
types.description: An enum describing what kind of type a given __Type is

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a scalar.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an object. `fields` and `interfaces` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an interface. `fields` and `possibleTypes` are valid fields.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a union. `possibleTypes` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an enum. `enumValues` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is an input object. `inputFields` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: LIST
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a list. `ofType` is a valid field.

enumValues.name: NON_NULL
enumValues.description: Indicates this type is a non-null. `ofType` is a valid field.

types.name: __DirectiveLocation
types.description: An enum describing valid locations where a directive can be placed

enumValues.name: QUERY
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on queries.

enumValues.name: MUTATION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on mutations.

enumValues.name: FIELD
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on fields.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on fragment definitions.

enumValues.name: FRAGMENT_SPREAD
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on fragment spreads.

enumValues.name: INLINE_FRAGMENT
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on inline fragments.

enumValues.name: SCHEMA
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on a schema IDL definition.

enumValues.name: SCALAR
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on a scalar IDL definition.

enumValues.name: OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an object IDL definition.

enumValues.name: FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on a field IDL definition.

enumValues.name: ARGUMENT_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on a field argument IDL definition.

enumValues.name: INTERFACE
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an interface IDL definition.

enumValues.name: UNION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an union IDL definition.

enumValues.name: ENUM
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an enum IDL definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_OBJECT
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an input object IDL definition.

enumValues.name: INPUT_FIELD_DEFINITION
enumValues.description: Indicates the directive is valid on an input object field IDL definition.

directives.name: include
directives.description: Directs the executor to include this field or fragment only when the `if` argument is true

directives.name: skip
directives.description: Directs the executor to skip this field or fragment when the `if`'argument is true.
